Some transfers are immediate while others take some time.
IMPS (Immediate Payment Service) or similar services within specific countries is usually instantaneous using the NEFT system (National Electronic Funds Transfer).
Sending money abroad can be done through the bank or apps. Both can take anywhere from 2-5 business days. Fees vary based on location and the amount.
Popular apps include WISE, PayPal, Western Union. Apps are generally faster at sending money than banks.
